jd: Hi, This is Shanu Francis from Parmesoft. We have an immediate opening for PMO Lead - Miami, FL with my client. So, Please have a look on the Job Description below and reply me back if you are interested. Position: PMO Lead Location: Miami, FL Contract • Set up and implement PMO structures, governance, and portfolio management processes. • Drive the successful delivery of programs and projects through effective collaboration with project and program managers. • Manage portfolio intake and assessment processes, including prioritization, resource allocation, and risk management. • Provide regular insights to the CIO and IT leadership on project performance, budgeting, and financial metrics. • Oversee portfolio budgeting and financial tracking to ensure alignment with organizational goals. • Coordinate with IT and business leadership teams to ensure smooth execution of budgeting and planning cycles. Qualifications: • Proven experience in setting up and managing PMO and portfolio management frameworks. • Expertise with Program and Portfolio Management (PPM) tools and processes. • Strong background in financial management, budgeting, and reporting for IT projects. • Excellent communication and leadership skills with the ability to work cross-functionally.
